title: conditions and processes mentioned in this Regulation, appoint such applicant as implementation agency at the Base Premium
clause_text: conditions and processes mentioned in this Regulation, appoint such applicant as implementation agency at the Base Premium.(1)The Authority shall decide base premium with the approval of High Power Committee (HPC).
